title: In San Diego, my 2018 XL2 phone seems to heat up at I'm trying to send photos through messages,
content: Just wondering if the battery is going bad. It's only been a little over two years. Don't have the phone in the sun at all. Not in a hot environment either. Battery at 60%, then trying to send some photos through messages and now battery at 36%, and feels quite warm and photos take forever to download
